subject: Serious Delays in taking in-principle approvals of Change of Scope (COS)
text: IRd <4 <THFf giferazrot (7sd5 4Rde7 8 TTHRf HAR4, IRa TaFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 074 Td 6i-5 Q 6, #qzr-10, E1A5, T @cchf 110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 3414 /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ Standard Documents/ 2023 Policy Circular No.11.46/ 2023 dated 21st February, 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD/EPC/202O (Comp No. 46753)} Sub:: Serious Delays in taking in-principle approvals of Change of Scope (COS) reg: In continuation of Policy Circular No. 8.3.41/2021 dated 24.08.2021 (copy enclosed) and with a view to further expedite in-principle approvals of COS, it has been decided by EC in its 539th Meeting held on 08.12.2022 that in-principle approvals of COS be sought based on normative costs as per MoRTH Circular No. RWINH- 24036/55/2021- BPGSP dated 19.01.2022 (copy enclosed) - Encl:: As stated above 6ilox1n3 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: AlI Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1_ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2_ Library for hosting the circular on library site_ 3. Web Admin for circulation. Kat U D9 NHAL Copy
